code: import axios from'axios';const API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api'});export function setAuthToken(token){if(token)API.defaults.headers.common.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);else delete API.defaults.headers.common.Authorization;}export function clearAuthToken(){delete API.defaults.headers.common.Authorization;}const storedToken=typeof window!=='undefined'?localStorage.getItem('token'):null;if(storedToken){setAuthToken(storedToken);}export default API;
